Package de.tum.cit.fop.maze

Class Hud

java.lang.Object
de.tum.cit.fop.maze.Hud
public class Hud extends Object
Heads-Up Display (HUD) that shows game information overlaid on top of the gameplay screen. Displays the current level, lives, key status, stamina bar, XP bar, score, and a compass arrow pointing to the current objective. The HUD uses a separate viewport so it stays fixed on screen regardless of camera movement. All UI elements are positioned in screen space rather than world space.

  • Field Details

    • stage

      public com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Stage stage

  • Constructor Details

    • Hud

      public Hud(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.BitmapFont font)
      Creates a new HUD instance with the specified batch and font. Sets up the viewport, creates textures for bars, and loads the compass arrow.
      Parameters:
      batch - the shared SpriteBatch used for rendering the HUD
      font - the BitmapFont used to draw all text on the HUD

  • Method Details

    • addScorePopup

      public void addScorePopup(String text, boolean positive)
      Adds a floating score popup notification that animates upward and fades out. Used when the player gains or loses points (collecting items, taking damage, etc.).
      Parameters:
      text - the text to display (e.g., "+200", "Damage -100")
      positive - true for green text (gain), false for red text (loss)

    • draw

      public void draw(int level, boolean isStory, boolean keyCollected, int lives, String status, float currentStamina, float maxStamina, int displayZoom, float playerX, float playerY, float targetX, float targetY, MazeRunnerGame game)
      Renders all HUD elements on the screen. Draws mode, level, lives, key status, stamina bar, XP bar, score, compass, and popups.
      Parameters:
      level - current level number
      isStory - true if in story mode, false if in endless mode
      keyCollected - true if the player has collected the key
      lives - player's current number of lives
      status - string describing active status effect (not currently used)
      currentStamina - player's current stamina value
      maxStamina - player's maximum stamina capacity
      displayZoom - current camera zoom percentage (50-150%)
      playerX - player's X position in world space
      playerY - player's Y position in world space
      targetX - X position of the current objective (key or exit)
      targetY - Y position of the current objective (key or exit)
      game - reference to main game for accessing textures

    • drawStatusEffects

      public void drawStatusEffects(Player player, MazeRunnerGame game)
      Process and renders the HUD elements for the Effects from the traps They show up on the left side of the screen below all the other HUD elements
      Parameters:
      player - The entity providing the current timer data.
      game - The central hub used for asset retrieval.

    • showLevelUpNotification

      public void showLevelUpNotification()
      Triggers the level up notification to display for 3 seconds. Called by GameScreen when the player earns a skill point.

    • resize

      public void resize(int width, int height)
      Called when the window is resized. Updates the HUD viewport to maintain proper scaling and positioning.
      Parameters:
      width - the new window width in pixels
      height - the new window height in pixels

    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Cleans up resources when the HUD is no longer needed. Disposes of textures and the stage to prevent memory leaks.
